dmca.title: Star's Edge Claims Newsgroup Posts Infringe (#7)
dmca.body:
08/05/04 15:54 FAX [private]	STAR'S EDGE INT'L	

STAR'S EDGE INTERNATIONAL
[private]
[private] TEL
[private] FAX
[private]@AVATARHQ.COM E-MAIL

August 5, 2004

Google, Inc.
Attn: User Support, DMCA Complaints [private]
Mountain View, CA 94043
Fax: [private]

Re: Notice of Copyright Infringement Under the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA)

Dear Sir or Madam:

We recently learned of content available through the Google groups function which infringes our 

copyright. Please note that this is additional infringing content that was not included in our 

letter of August 2, 2004.

Pursuant to the DMCA, the copyright owner respectfully requests that you remove the unauthorized, 

infringing materials from your web site immediately.

The copyrighted works infringed are course materials and lecture transcripts that were each 

copyrighted in 1987 by Harry Palmer. All rights reserved. The lecture transcript has been the 

subject of previous DMCA notices as it was previously posted by this same user. The location data 

for the infringing posts follow.

The message IDs for the infringing posts are
ceangb$21i$1@reader08.wxs.nl
